title: I think
creator_credit: Gene Feldman and Wombat Productions, Inc.
brief_description: Deals with the difficulties facing children as they struggle to develop individual identities. Linda, a 10 year old, is subject to a variety of pressures to think and act as other people wish. Considers group identity, influence of the media, family and teachers.
